title: RBI tells banks to find ways to bridge the gap between credit and deposit growth
description: The meeting addressed various banking challenges including credit-deposit ratio, cybersecurity, and digital frauds. Governor Das emphasized the need for robust cybersecurity controls and customer awareness initiatives to curb digital frauds.
